universum.studios.android.recycler.helper

Interface ItemSwipeHelper.SwipeViewHolder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RecyclerViewItemHelper.InteractiveViewHolder
    Enclosing class:
    ItemSwipeHelper

    public static interface ItemSwipeHelper.SwipeViewHolder
extends RecyclerViewItemHelper.InteractiveViewHolder
    Required interface for all ViewHolders which want to support swipe feature for theirs corresponding item views.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSwipeCanceled()
      Called by the swipe helper whenever swipe gesture for view of this holder is canceled.
      void onSwipeFinished(int direction)
      Called by the swipe helper whenever swipe gesture for view of this holder is finished in the specified direction.
      void onSwipeStarted()
      Called by the swipe helper whenever swipe gesture for view of this holder is started.

      • Methods inherited from interface universum.studios.android.recycler.helper.RecyclerViewItemHelper.InteractiveViewHolder

        getInteractiveView, onDraw, onDrawOver

    • Method Detail

      • onSwipeStarted

        void onSwipeStarted()
        Called by the swipe helper whenever swipe gesture for view of this holder is started.
        See Also:
        onSwipeFinished(int), onSwipeCanceled(), ItemSwipeHelper.Callback#onSelectedChanged(RecyclerView.ViewHolder, int)

      • onSwipeFinished

        void onSwipeFinished(int direction)
        Called by the swipe helper whenever swipe gesture for view of this holder is finished in the specified direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction in which has the swipe gestured finished. One of directions defined by @Direction annotation.
        See Also:
        onSwipeStarted(), ItemSwipeHelper.Callback#onSwiped(RecyclerView.ViewHolder, int)

      • onSwipeCanceled

        void onSwipeCanceled()
        Called by the swipe helper whenever swipe gesture for view of this holder is canceled.
        See Also:
        onSwipeStarted(), ItemSwipeHelper.Callback#clearView(RecyclerView, RecyclerView.ViewHolder)
